org.springframework.geode.data.json.converter

Class AbstractObjectArrayToJsonConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.geode.data.json.converter.AbstractObjectArrayToJsonConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.core.convert.converter.Converter<java.lang.Iterable<?>,java.lang.String>, ObjectArrayToJsonConverter

    public abstract class AbstractObjectArrayToJsonConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObjectArrayToJsonConverter
    An abstract base class implementing ObjectArrayToJsonConverter encapsulating functionality common to all implementations.
    Since:
    1.3.0
    See Also:
    Iterable, Map, ObjectArrayToJsonConverter

protected ObjectToJsonConverter getObjectToJsonConverter()

      • convert

        @NonNull
public java.lang.String convert(@NonNull
                                         java.lang.Iterable<?> iterable)
        Converts the given Iterable of Objects into a JSON array.
        Specified by:
        convert in interface org.springframework.core.convert.converter.Converter<java.lang.Iterable<?>,java.lang.String>
        Parameters:
        iterable - Iterable containing the Objects to convert into JSON; must not be null.
        Returns:
        the JSON generated from the given Iterable of Objects; never null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if Iterable is null.
        See Also:
        getObjectToJsonConverter(), Iterable

      • convert

        @NonNull
public <K,V> java.lang.String convert(@Nullable
                                               java.util.Map<K,V> map)
        Converts the values from the given Map into JSON.
        Type Parameters:
        K - Class type of the keys.
        V - Class type of the values.
        Parameters:
        map - Map containing the values to convert into JSON.
        Returns:
        JSON generated from the values in the given Map.
